sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import streamAudioWithAuth from './helpers/audioStreamWithAuth' import blobUrlFromId from './helpers/blobUrlFromId' export default function AudioCard({ title, _id, tags, createdAt }) { const storedToken = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); return (

{title}

{tags.join(", ")}

{new Date(createdAt).toDateString()}

) }
